description: Canadian Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development requires real estate service in the Local Market Awareness for the Embassy of Canada to Italy
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title** 
Real Estate Brokerage Services for Local Property Market Awareness for the Embassy of Canada to Italy, in Rome

**Reference Number** #CBCB4567439990

**Amendment Number** 7  
This tender is an amendment to the original tender notice solicitation number 25-265824.

**Publication Date** May 17, 2024  
The tender is now expired.

**Tender Closing Date** June 14, 2024, 02:00 PM (UTC-5)

**Brief Description**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development (DFATD) invites prospective vendors to submit a proposal for the provision of real estate services for local market awareness for the Embassy of Canada to Italy, in Rome. 

**Key Highlights**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreement:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Italy
* **Regions of Delivery:** World
* **Contracting Entity:** The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development
* **Contact Information:**
    Tanya Di Virgilio
    realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
    (343) 573-0472

**Attachments**

* [Tender Notice and amendments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38356/25-265824-rfp_1.pdf)
* [Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38356/addendum-001_0.pdf)
* [Addendum 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38356/addendum-002.pdf)

   ... 

Note that, I condensed the content and rewritten the text in a more impactful manner for easier read, leaving only key information. Some attachments were also redundant, thus not included. You might want to discuss with the contractor to obtain the final publication enquiry artefacts. 
Please reach me if you'd like further amimations. I am here help, 24/7 backed with top-echelon customer service.  Best regards.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

\"Technical Notions Consulting  Affiliated Team: <https://pineapple.parsec.io>
